EmailTemplate.name: MC-2021FY-HP-ELEVATE-EXPERTS.mirro
EmailTemplate.subject: Best-in-class coaching supports better health outcomes
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Exploring health coaching Whitney Mirro Senior Vice President of Clinical Services Teladoc Health Health coaching for chronic condition management is one of the most meaningful ways we’ve found to empower individuals to improve their health outcomes. As part of a new set of conversations we’re calling Virtual Care Connections, we recently sat down with Whitney Mirro, Senior Vice President of Clinical Services at Teladoc Health, to talk about what health coaching brings to the virtual health care experience. In it, Whitney shares: - Why she believes health coaching is so important to individual health outcomes and to healthcare delivery. - Insights on how Teladoc Health delivers member and client value through health coaching. - Real-world results and benefits she’s seen through the power of health coaching. Check out the full discussion with Whitney <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/article/HP/best-in-class-coaching-supports-better-health/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=health-plan&utm_campaign=Elevate-the-Experts]]> and then connect with us <[[mailto:engage@teladochealth.com]]> to explore how health coaching could help you and your plan members. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
